location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter Office No. 99 of 1856 from Commander James Felix Jones, Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire to Charles Augustus Murray, HM Minister Plenipotentiary and Envoy Extraordinary at the Court of Persia

mods.abstract: The letter is reporting the arrival of Hajee Kuwaumool Moolk from Shiraz on 11 March 1856. It also reports on the progress of work on Bushire's fortifications, and the number of troops currently stationed there.It is also enclosing a number of letters (detailed in the margin), but these are not present in the file.
